body:
Hi Anton, I had the same problem but indeed the E+ was running on the background processes. Before I made this happen though I was failing because

1) I was not changing the Working directory in the "ReRun IDF" component. 

2) Even when I changed it  E+ was refusing to run any file that is located outside a local folder placed in 'c:\' (where I also have the E+ installed) even when I was trying to run as an administrator with full access to all of the other local and network folders!



Tasos
